weka.server.logging

Class ServerLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.server.logging.ServerLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logger

    public class ServerLogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Logger
    Class that provides logging to a file and also maintains the most recent 100 log lines and 50 status lines in memory.
    Version:
    $Revision: 10248 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
